job_description:
Flutter Developer

We are looking for a skilled and motivated Flutter Developer to join our mobile development team at 2Base Technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for building high-quality, scalable, and user-friendly mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. You will work across the full app development lifecycle, collaborating closely with designers, product managers, and engineers to deliver seamless user experiences on both Android and iOS platforms.

Responsibilities

  • Develop, test, and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
  • Collaborate closely with UI/UX designers, backend engineers, and product managers to deliver new features with a seamless user experience.
  • Convert clean UI/UX designs into responsive, functional, and pixel-perfect user interfaces across Android and iOS platforms.
  • Integrate RESTful APIs, GraphQL endpoints, and third-party libraries to extend app functionality.
  • Ensure application performance, responsiveness, and stability, actively monitoring and addressing issues as they arise.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and testable code, following best practices for Flutter app development.
  • Participate in code reviews, daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and other agile ceremonies to ensure continuous improvement and delivery.
  • Manage version control using Git and maintain proper documentation of features and technical decisions.
  • Handle end-to-end deployment of applications on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store, including app signing, release management, and updates.
  • Stay updated with Flutter ecosystem advancements and propose improvements to enhance app performance and development workflows.

Requirements

  • 1–2 years of hands-on experience in developing and deploying Flutter applications for Android and iOS platforms.
  • Strong command of Dart and a solid understanding of Flutter architecture, including widget tree, animations, and asynchronous programming.
  • Proven experience with Firebase services (Firestore, Authentication, Push Notifications), RESTful APIs, and third-party plugin integration.
  • Familiarity with state management solutions such as Provider, BLoC, or GetX for scalable application architecture.
  • Ability to create pixel-perfect, responsive, and adaptive user interfaces across a range of devices and screen sizes.
  • Understanding of the mobile app lifecycle, including debugging, performance profiling, and crash analytics.
  • Proficiency with Git and collaboration tools (GitHub/GitLab) and understanding of branching strategies and version control workflows.
  • Experience with dependency injection tools like get_it or injectable for clean and maintainable codebases.
  • Knowledge and hands-on experience with app deployment and release management on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
  • Familiarity with clean architecture and modular coding practices to maintain scalable and testable codebases.
  • Ability to implement internet connectivity checks and offline-aware logic within mobile applications.
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment.
  • Exposure to unit testing and CI/CD workflows in Flutter projects is a plus.
  • Exposure to writing unit and widget tests in Flutter.
  • Familiarity with native Android or iOS development is a bonus.

Experience and Education

  • 1–2 Years
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related discipline.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com
summary: Join 2Base Technologies as a Flutter Developer! Build scalable mobile apps, collaborate with a talented team, and enhance user experiences on Android and iOS.

job_description:
Senior Database Administrator

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking a Senior Database Administrator to oversee the management, maintenance, and optimization of databases within the organization. The ideal candidate will work on strategic initiatives to align the database infrastructure with long-term business goals and ensure that best practices in database management are consistently followed.

Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581

Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com

Closing Date: July 11, 2025

Job Published: July 04, 2025

Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Main Duties/Responsibilities:

  • Optimize database queries to ensure fast and efficient data retrieval, particularly for complex or high-volume operations.
  • Design and implement effective indexing strategies to reduce query execution times and improve overall database performance.
  • Monitor and profile slow or inefficient queries and recommend best practices for rewriting or re-architecting queries.
  • Continuously analyze execution plans for SQL queries to identify bottlenecks and optimize them.
  • Schedule and execute regular maintenance tasks, including backups, consistency checks, and index rebuilding.
  • Implement automated monitoring systems to track database performance, availability, and critical parameters such as CPU usage, memory, disk I/O, and replication status.
  • Diagnose and resolve database issues (e.g., locking, deadlocks, data corruption) proactively, before they impact users or operations.
  • Implement and manage database clustering, replication, and failover strategies to ensure high availability and disaster recovery (e.g., using tools like SQL Server Always On, Oracle RAC, MySQL Group Replication).
  • Monitor resource consumption and plan for growth to ensure the database can scale effectively with increasing data volume and transaction load.
  • Analyze and optimize resource usage (CPU, memory, disk, network) to reduce operational costs.
  • Ensure that database licensing models are properly adhered to and identify opportunities for reducing licensing costs.
  • Use cost analysis tools (e.g., AWS Cost Explorer, Azure Cost Management) to monitor and optimize cloud database spend, identifying opportunities for right sizing or reserving instances.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field.
  • 5-7 years of experience in Microsoft SQL Server administration
  • Microsoft SQL certifications (MTA Database, MCSA: SQL Server, MCSE: Data Management and Analytics) will be an advantage.

Secondary Skills:

  • Experience in MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Oracle database administration.
  • Exposure to Data Lake, Hadoop, and Azure technologies
  • Exposure to DevOps or ITIL

Behavioral Competencies:

  • Communication
  • Teamwork
  • Digital Mindset
  • Operational Excellence
  • Analytical Ability
  • Customer Centricity
  • Business and Market Acumen
  • Empathy
  • Growth Mindset

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Please Note: Reflections Info Systems does not ask for fees for job opportunities. Contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarification.
summary: Reflections Info Systems is hiring a Senior Database Administrator to manage and optimize databases. The role involves ensuring high availability, performance, and strategic alignment with business goals.

job_description:
SAP BW Technical Consultant (with Data Migration Experience)

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking a Senior SAP BW Technical Consultant to lead and execute a complex data migration project from SAP BW to Snowflake for a global headwear and retail business. The consultant will translate business requirements into detailed architecture designs and deliver requirements by developing and enhancing SAP BW/BOBJ & HANA solutions. This role involves all aspects of delivering BW solutions from design and development to implementation. The consultant will also lead the implementation of reporting analytics solutions focused on managing data integrity, aggregating, reconciling, and integrating data from multiple data sources (SAP and Non-SAP) into a global consolidated SAP BW HANA reporting platform with Industry Best Practices to enable informed decision-making capabilities.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead and execute a complex data migration project from SAP BW to Snowflake.
  • Evaluate current SAP BW HANA system capabilities to identify changes and determine the impact on the business.
  • Develop technical specifications/detailed designs for BW HANA Technical Development of Data Modeling and HANA Calculation Views in Control Reports.
  • Develop backend Bex Queries and Composite Providers in SAP BW HANA.
  • Design & develop frontend visualization tools and dashboards using Business Objects WEBI, SAP Lumira/SAP Analytics on Cloud.
  • Develop SAP HANA data models using ADSO, Attribute View, Analytic View, and Calculation View.
  • Develop and enhance BW objects such as InfoObjects, InfoCubes, Insources/Data Sources, Master Data, Transformations, Update Rules, DSO, Extractors, Infosets, Aggregates, Process Chains, DTPs, User Exits, BADI, and HANA objects like Schemas, Calculated, Analytical, or Scripted Views using HANA Modeller.
  • Lead the solution design, development, and implementation of SAP BW HANA & Cloud solutions.
  • Lead SAP HANA data modelling efforts and provide hands-on technical expertise on overall architecture, technical design, configuration, development, and implementation of the SAP BI/BW and NATIVE HANA solutions.
  • Responsible for performance tuning of BW systems utilizing best practices.
  • Provide guidance on BW HANA security setup and enforce data governance standards and processes.
  • Responsible for root cause analysis and providing solutions for SAP BW Reporting production and development issues.
  • Determine the BW architectural standards and right data ingestion approach from disparate source applications using different real-time and batch-enabling technologies into Native HANA.
  • Mentor a team of junior HANA BW resources and participate in sharing expertise on HANA, driving HANA growth initiatives internally.

Preferred Skills (Primary):

  • Deep understanding of SAP HANA Data Modeling techniques and HANA Studio using Attribute View, Analytic View, and Calculation Views. Modeling experience along with HANA related development languages (SQL Script, HTML5, Javascript, Java).
  • Experience in Visualization & Reporting tools such as BO Webi, Analysis for Office, SAP Lumira/SAP Analytics.
  • Experience in the design and development of MultiProviders, InfoCubes, InfoSources, Transfer Structures, DataStore Objects (DSO), Transformations and Data Transfer Process (DTPs), InfoPackages, Transfer Rules and Update Rules.
  • General understanding and technical expertise of enterprise-class ETL/BI tools (Oracle BIEE, IBM Cognos, SAS, Informatica, Tableau).
  • Exposure to BODS / ETL / SQL Script Tool HANA.
  • Understanding of the BW HANA Security Model.
  • Experience in SAP BPC/BPS project implementations is preferred. Knowledge of BPC Excel, and BPC Web UI is a plus.
  • Experience in a multi-cultural, global organization; fluent in English with other spoken languages a plus.
  • Strong functional knowledge of ECC Extraction in the areas of Finance, Supply Chain, SD/MM/PP -Logistics.
  • Experience with SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC), Power BI, or Tableau integrated with Snowflake.

Secondary Skills:

  • Understanding of Agile delivery and DevOps principles in BI projects.
  • Knowledge of data governance, data security, and compliance in cloud and hybrid environments.
  • Good analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail.
  • Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

Working Hours:

  • 8 hours per day, with a few hours of overlap during EST Time zone (mandatory for meetings). Working hours will be 12 PM - 9 PM.

job_description:
Systems Engineer

Ospyn Technologies Ltd 1st Floor, Kabani Building, Technopark Phase-4, Pallipuram, Thiruvananthapuram, 695317 http://www.ospyn.com

Contact Email: careers@ospyn.com

Closing Date: 18, July 2025 Job Published: 03, July 2025

Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage and maintain large-scale Linux server infrastructure (physical, virtual, and cloud).
  • Plan and execute OS upgrades, patching, and kernel updates with minimal downtime.
  • Perform capacity planning, performance tuning, and system optimization.
  • Design and implement automated scripts and Ansible playbooks for configuration management and deployments.
  • Configure and secure services such as Apache, Nginx, MySQL/PostgreSQL, Tomcat, JBoss, WebLogic, FTP, NFS, and Samba.
  • Troubleshoot complex system, network, and application issues across multiple environments.
  • Set up and manage firewall rules, SELinux, auditing, and system hardening measures.
  • Monitor and manage logs, system health, and alerts using tools like Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana, or Nagios.
  • Manage centralized backup systems, disaster recovery plans, and storage (LVM, RAID, SAN/NAS).
  • Participate in incident, change, and problem management processes.
  • Support DevOps processes and CI/CD pipeline integrations.

Required Skills:

  • Expertise in Linux (RHEL/CentOS/Ubuntu) system administration and troubleshooting.
  • Strong scripting experience in Bash, Python, or Perl.
  • Proficiency in server hardening, auditing, and securing Linux systems.
  • Hands-on experience with virtualization technologies (KVM, VMware, Proxmox).
  • Basic knowledge of database administration (MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL).
  • Familiarity with container technologies (Docker) and basic Kubernetes.
  • Solid understanding of networking fundamentals: TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, LDAP, VPN.
  • Experience with Git, Jenkins, and CI/CD pipelines.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (BE) or Master’s in Computer Applications (MCA).
  • Certifications: RHCSA / RHCE or equivalent.
  • Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Familiarity with HAProxy, Load Balancing, and clustering

Preferred Skills (Soft Skills):

  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to lead small tasks or mentor junior staff.
  • Capable of prioritizing and managing multiple tasks in high-pressure environments.
  • Willingness to work in on-call rotation and provide extended support when required.

Experience: 2-4 years
summary: Ospyn Technologies is seeking a Systems Engineer to manage Linux infrastructure and support DevOps processes. The role involves system administration, automation, and troubleshooting in diverse environments.
